noun.description: The quality of having great weight.
examples: Olivia felt the heaviness of her backpack

noun.description: A state of being greater in amount, force, or intensity than usual.
examples: the heaviness of the rains in the valley caused flooding
the heaviness of their earlier defeat

noun.description: The quality of being very important or serious.
examples: a few cartoon gags were introduced into the film to lighten its heaviness
